quote_first: The doctor came into the waiting room at
quote_last:
that night.
Charity came to her feet. She’d spent much of the day with her head bowed, praying quietly. She was beyond tears, at least for the moment, and she put a sheltering arm around her daughter, pulling Molly in close to her side.
title: Small Favor
author: Jim Butcher

quote_last: when Phil closed the door and turned out the light on the landing, but I knew I couldn’t leave straight away.
title: I Never Gave My Consent
author: Holly Archer
